response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and functionality. Considering its exceptional features and the craftsmanship involved, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I kindly propose a price of $200 for this product. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations and provide immense value to you. Thank you for considering my offer.", "product_price": 200}
